product_summary: Helper-AI is an AI-powered tool that provides instant access to ChatGPT on any website. It can generate high-quality content, write code and Excel formulas, rewrite, research, summarize, and more. Helper-AI works with all macOS and Windows operating systems.
product_pros: Can write code and Excel formulas
Works with all macOS and Windows operating systems
product_cons: May not be as accurate as a human
May not be able to handle complex tasks
Can be expensive for some users
May be biased towards certain topics
May not be able to generate original content

product_usecases.details: Helper-AI can generate high-quality content for blog posts, articles, social media posts, and more.
Helper-AI can write code in a variety of programming languages, including Python, Java, and C++.
Helper-AI can automate tasks in Excel, such as data entry, formatting, and analysis.
Helper-AI can research and summarize information from a variety of sources, including the web, books, and journals.
Helper-AI can be used for a variety of other tasks, such as translation, language learning, and personal assistance.

product_toolfor.details: Helper-AI can help students with their homework, research, and writing assignments.
Helper-AI can help businesses with their content marketing, code development, and data analysis.
Helper-AI can help individuals with their personal tasks, such as writing, research, and language learning.
Helper-AI can help developers with their coding tasks, such as writing code, debugging, and testing.
Helper-AI can help writers with their writing tasks, such as generating ideas, writing content, and editing.

product_pricing: One-time purchase with free lifetime updates
